channel.title: Morality in the Public Eye: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Yaakov Weinberg ztl
channel.description: Has society become so open minded that its brain has fallen out? Hear how mixed up today's modern society has become in its quest for morality, and how it has left itself vulnerable to a new set of problems.

item.title: Morality in the Public Eye
